title: Kumbonggang station
text:
Kŭmbonggang station is a <a href="railway%20station">railway station</a> in P'aech'ŏl-li, <a href="Tongchon%20County">T'ongch'ŏn</a> county, <a href="Kangwon%20Province%20%28North%20Korea%29">Kangwŏn</a> province, <a href="North%20Korea">North Korea</a> on the <a href="Kumgangsan%20Chongnyon%20Line">Kŭmgangsan Ch'ŏngnyŏn Line</a> of the <a href="Korean%20State%20Railway">Korean State Railway</a>.
History.
The station, originally called P'aech'ŏn station was opened on 21 July 1931 by the <a href="Chosen%20Government%20Railway">Chosen Government Railway</a>, along with the rest of the second section of the original <a href="Donghae%20Bukbu%20Line">Tonghae Pukpu Line</a> from <a href="Myonggo%20Station">Hŭpkok</a> (nowadays Myŏnggo) to <a href="Tonghae%20Station">T'ongch'ŏn</a> (nowadays Tonghae).
